data.name: CliHelpText
data.value:
USAGE: automerge [OPTIONS] [BASE LOCAL REMOTE MERGED] automerge [OPTIONS] LOCAL REMOTE
ARGUMENTS: BASE Path to the base (common ancestor) file LOCAL Path to the local (ours) file REMOTE Path to the remote (theirs) file MERGED Path to write the merged output
MODES: Merge mode (default): Provide local, remote, and merged paths (base optional). Diff mode: Provide only local and remote paths for side-by-side comparison.
OPTIONS: --base <PATH> Path to base file (alternative to positional) --local <PATH> Path to local file (alternative to positional) --remote <PATH> Path to remote file (alternative to positional) --merged <PATH> Path to merged output file (alternative to positional) --wait Wait for GUI to close before returning (default: true) --no-gui Run in headless mode (future feature) --help, -h Show this help message --version, -v Show version information
EXIT CODES: 0 Resolution accepted and saved (merge) / files compared (diff) 1 Resolution cancelled or error occurred
EXAMPLES: # GUI mode with file picker automerge
# Diff mode (side-by-side comparison) automerge --local file.ours --remote file.theirs automerge LOCAL REMOTE
# Standard 4-file merge (for git mergetool) automerge BASE LOCAL REMOTE MERGED
# Named arguments automerge --base=file.base --local=file.ours --remote=file.theirs --merged=file.out
# Fork / SourceTree integration automerge --base "$BASE" --local "$LOCAL" --remote "$REMOTE" --merged "$MERGED"
